Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Reroute at Irving Park/Pontiac
ShortDescription: 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Forest Preserve, Addison and Cumberland terminal, near Irving Park/Pontiac

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via Irving Park, Forest Preserve, Addison and Cumberland terminal due to street blockage near Irving Park/Pontiac

Allow extra travel time.
